thread.title: Video: Rick Pitino restrained while yelling at UNC fan
thread.title_full: Video: Rick Pitino restrained while yelling at UNC fan

title: Video: Rick Pitino restrained while yelling at UNC fan
text:
Manage Video: Rick Pitino restrained while yelling at UNC fan Louisville assistant coaches had to hold Rick Pitino back after he got in a shouting match with a North Carolina fan. Slot to 247Sports Links 
Whatever this North Carolina fan said to Louisville coach Rick Pitino made him irate. 
Pitino had to be restrained after he started shouting at a Tar Heels fan on the way to the locker room for halftime. It's unclear what the spectator did to set Pitino off, but North Carolina later announced that the person was ejected from the arena. 
North Carolina led Louisville 33-30 at the intermission. Author
